title: The second volume of Plutarch's Lives Translated from the Greek, by several hands.
author: Plutarch.
publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges-Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-Street,
notes: A translation of the third volume of: Plutarchus. Vitae parallelae.
With additional engraved title page, reading: Plu:tarch Lives Vol: 2d.
With a final page of advertisements.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
